name: AceJump
description: AceJump allows you to quickly navigate the caret to any position visible in the editor. See a demo of AceJump in action! Simply hit "ctrl+;", type a character, then type the matching character to Ace Jump.
notes:
• Displays regular expression for regex-based queries
  • Fixes a bug when current search text was enabled causing word and line mode tags to not be displayed, #376
